title: Child dies days after Newport crash that killed woman
article: A 19-month-old child has died in hospital following a crash in Shropshire that also left a woman dead. The woman, in her 40s, who was driving a blue Mini,died at the scene on Saturday on the A518 New Trench Road , between Newport and Lilleshall. Her car collided with a grey Fiat 500X in which two people were travelling with the toddler. The child was taken to hospital in a critical condition and died on Monday, West Mercia Police said.The two adults were also taken to hospital with serious injuries following the crash that happened at 18:20 GMT. The West Mercia force has renewed its appeal for witnesses or anyone with dashcam footage to come forward. Follow BBC West Midlands on Facebook , Twitter and Instagram .
